entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
